Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: Excellet place for dinner! Owners are incredibly nice people and take care about every detail of your experience. We took some hot starters, casserole and meat mix and everything was delicious! Hightly recommended

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: Really great little Turkish place. The whole sea bass was excellent. Felt like simple,  homemade cuisine but with a little extra special something. The rice is very tasty as well. Recommended.

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: Extremelly tasty food, the staff really caring and nice, we enjoyed the dinner a lot

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: An amazing restaurant with some of the most friendly staff you'll find in a restaurant. Visited a few times, they always recognize us and will check on us on how're doing! Super recommended.

Name: Bistro Bos

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: We had a lovely dinner at Bistro Bos on a Saturday evening. It is a small restaurant with warm and attentive service and great quality of food for both mezes and main dishes. We were seven people, four adults and three kids and tasted ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: Had a wonderful diner with seven other people here. Staff was very swift to help. My food dish was good and tasty, while for others their meat was a bit too medium for their taste. Would love to eat there again.

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: The server and food was excellent üëç

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: This place is a hidden jewel. One of the very best restaurants in Amsterdam West. Very cozy and welcoming place with wonderfully tasting and authentic food. The appetizers are out of this world. Service is outstanding!! I would highly recommend this place to all my friends. Great for weekday meals too.

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: Food was delicious.  Well presented and nicely served. We used a discount deal  and there's absolutely no difference than a normal reservation.  Staff is friendly,  I'd recommend.  I'm coming back for sure.

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: Quaint little Mediterranean eatery away from the madding crowd but within reach of the lively Westerpark. Friendly staff, prompt service and very good food at a reasonable price. A couple of veggie options but no vegan mains nor desserts. The place has a homely feel to it. A great choice for an uncommercial but tasty meal

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: We arrived a little late into Amsterdam and just lucked out eating here.  I would eat here at least once a week if I could.  The food was truly incredible.  And the hosts are really nice and welcoming.  I want to go back!

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: Very nice place with few tourists. We tried Pizza, Pasta and meat and it all tastet fantastic. The prices are absolutely normal. The waitress speaks a little english, but perfectly french and did everything so we could enjoy our stay there. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: The meat was cooked good. Rice is great. Salad is too oily. Be sure to ask for sauce, cause they don't bring it by default. Prices are average (17 euro dinner and drink). The staff speaks poor English. No wifi.no tap beer

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: A wonderful little restaurant where we enjoyed a very lovely dinner.

Name: Bistro Bos
Review Text: The owners are just lovely people creating a warm and nice atmosphere. Food was good not great. Overall a cozy place for a relaxing night out!

Review Text: Delicious food and helpful and nice service. That is one of modern places to taste Turkish cuisine. I can also suggest Entrecote. It was super delicious.
